text: @Marsha34 Nooooooo TJ Maxx are asses to let that many people in the store right now. It’s amazing how many folks line up to get a taste of that heart stopping COVID-19. I guess they figure it Fake News. It is overwhelming but I am not trying COVID-19 because of others  stupidity
